game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the dungeon.
game.description: Rumor has it that a powerful artifact is buried deep within the forgotten dungeons. Retrieve it and bring glory to our kingdom.

task.objective: Enter the Dungeon of Forgotten Heroes
task.description: Make your way through the entrance to the dungeon located in the eastern forest.

task.objective: Defeat the Guardian of the Artifact
task.description: In the heart of the dungeon, a powerful guardian protects the artifact. Conquer it to claim the treasure.
